title: Opentype Latin Extended Additional font: any suggestions?
content:
Is anyone able to suggest a suitable body text for a book using the Latin Additional Extended block of Unicode (dots below s, m, n etc). The publisher requires the font NOT to be TrueType!

I’d be really grateful for any suggestions

John Hodgson

 [‹ Optical Illusion](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121219/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16310 "Go to previous forum topic") [Mac OSX System Fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121219/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16289 "Go to next forum topic")
author: JohnHodgson
